ideas.title: Security Scanning Service that Detects Compliance Violations and Prevents Security
ideas.description: A security scanning service that detects compliance violations and prevents security incidents in container images In this iteration, we're implementing add ai assistant for natural language interactions to significantly improve the user experience or interface.
ideas.monetization: Freemium model with paid advanced features
ideas.technical_approach: Multi-tenant SaaS with PostgreSQL and Redis caching
